column4: thank u so much. Why I should use crontab -e instead of vim directly?
crontab -e just opens up the file in your editor -- and that could be vim
I've tried with the line: * * * * * stefano /usr/bin/firefox but it doesn't start :-(
right, that's because like prince_jammys said sometime ago -- you need to set the DISPLAY variable for GUI apps to work from cron
